root: ^avô Pedro: So here we are young miss
^avô Pedro: Your job will be to tend to this pawn shop for magical artifacts
^avô Pedro: Clients will come in and present items that they want to part with
^avô Pedro: You will need to appraise the item and bargain with the client for a good price
^avô Pedro: I will be selling the newly acquired items tonight so please don't buy too much junk !
^avô Pedro: I'll help you for the first client. Look, they're coming in already,
^avô Pedro: Let's see what they have !

c-0: ^avô Pedro: That's the spirit! Let's get started.
c-1: ^avô Pedro: That's okay. Everyone starts somewhere. Just watch and learn.
